home.text-2-p3: , besides back-end I have knowledge in

projects.linear-system-description: A calculator that solves linear systems with n variables using the Gauss method. The user can input the equations and the program returns the solution of the system.
projects.party-manager-description: A project for managing birthday parties. The user can create, edit, and delete parties, as well as view the parties already created.

about.title: About:
about.text-1: My name is Vinícius and I am passionate about technology, music, games, and the geek universe as a whole. Quite often, I find myself picking up a game or an anime to watch. One of my hobbies is translating some of these from English to Portuguese for free, to allow other readers to also appreciate these works.
about.text-2: I started my studies in computing around 2018, during the first year of high school, where I began studying systems development. During this time, in addition to school classes, I also started following the lessons of Master Guanabara (YouTube channel: Curso em Vídeo), getting my hands dirty with Python, HTML, CSS, and JS.
about.text-3: Over the years, I have learned many things. As soon as I finished high school, I started my professional career as a support analyst and simultaneously began studying computer science at college. Work helped me solidify various networking knowledge I already had, as well as greatly improving my communication skills, as I had to deal with various clients daily, and I have always been somewhat shy.
about.text-4: As semesters went by, working and studying, I began looking for opportunities to work in development and in 2023, I started as a junior Java developer, which helped me direct my studies, and thus, I decided to focus on backend with Java and Spring Boot. By this time, I already had a general knowledge of the area.
about.text-5: I am currently in the 7th semester of computer science at Universidade São Judas Tadeu, where I acquired technical knowledge regarding computing processes and development as a whole, logic, data structures, databases, AI and language models, JavaScript, Node.js, Angular, Python, and Java.
about.text-6: And I continue studying, starting new projects, sometimes continuing old ones, always avoiding stagnation.

experience.university-1-description: Bachelor's degree in computer science, i studied computer science comprehensively, covering programming with Java, Node.js, Angular, Python, data structures, logic, AI, language models, networks, databases, among others.
experience.job-1-description: Development of new Java applications. Maintenance and support of existing applications, often involving the use of SQL databases, development of interfaces with SWING, web automation, and Web Scraping with Selenium, among other activities. I have direct communication with end users, always focusing on identifying and solving problems according to the business rules of processes and user needs.
experience.job-2-description: I worked as a support analyst. Among some of my responsibilities were backup management with Veeam, Cobian, and others, network management with Windows Server and its tools, Firewall and VPN with PFSENSE, deployment of the Zabbix monitoring system, as well as comprehensive technical support (N1 to N3) for clients from different sectors and sizes.
experience.course-1-title: Systems Development and IT Associate Degreee
experience.course-1-description: This is where I began my studies in the IT field, where I was introduced to the first programming languages such as Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as gaining a foundation in networking and operating systems.
